PRINCIPAL ROLES and RESPONSIBILITIES: •	Reports directly to the EUC Project Management team and is responsible for promoting a positive and productive working environment.•	Assist with the loading of equipment that is scheduled for installation at a customer location onto vehicles at the NWN warehouse.•	Assist with the unloading and staging of equipment for installation at a customer location.•	Assist with the installation of the equipment in a customer's environment, i.e., desktop computers, laptops, monitors, printers, etc. as required.•	Work under the supervision of the EUC Project Manager to configure, install and test new equipment and remove old equipment as required.•	Complete installation paperwork as required by the EUC Project Manager.•	Assist with warehouse equipment processing as needed.•	Assist in the assembly and configuration of equipment for customer orders, i.e., desktop computers, laptops, monitors, printers, etc.•	Completes deliveries by driving truck or van to and from customer locations as needed.•	Maintains quality service by following organization standards.•	Maintains safe and clean work environment by keeping customer and warehouse environments clean and organized; complying with procedures, rules, and regulations.•	Completes timely personal time entry reports by entering required information via online company portal.•	Maintains technical knowledge by pursuing additional training offered by NWN.•	Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related team goals as needed.
